Norwegian Institute for Water Research (NIVA) | Fullstack developer | Oslo, Norway | ONSITE | https://www.niva.no/en/vacancies

NIVA is Norwayâ€™s leading institute is Norway's leading institute for applied research on marine and freshwaters. As a part of NIVA's ongoing efforts to develop new data platforms and digital services, we are hiring a full-time developer to our Environmental Data Science team.

We are building a new modern infrastructure for data ingestion and distribution. We aim to move fast and build products that enable researchers, field workers and others to easily ingest and work with data.
